Home > Cell Phone Specs > Nokia Phones > Nokia 6630 Phone
front.div:
or those seeking
entertainment, the
Nokia 6630 offers a digital
MP3 music player and
real-time video streaming
on its bright color display.
The mobile broadband
capacity of WCDMA
networks enables the 6630 to show high-quality,
real-time video streaming and support video
conference calling. The RealOne player supports
the large existing base of Real-formatted video
content and new 3GPP content designed for
mobile devices. With 1.23 million effective pixels
in its camera, and a host of digital imaging
features, the 6630 is the most advanced camera
phone introduced in the GSM market to date.
Main Features
Sleek clamshell design with silver finish on front cover
Built-in 1.3-megapixel camera sensor with 6x smooth digital zoom,
sequence mode, and Video recording time up to 1 hour per clip
S60 software and J2ME support for application, ringer, wallpaper, graphic
and game downloads
Broadband speed with WCDMA and EDGE technology for high-speed data
transmission with WAP 2.0 compliant browser with improved HTML support
10 MB of internal memory and MultiMediaCard (MMC) memory expansion
slot for additional storage with optional card
